top.title: Bowen: Authoritarian regimes die gradually then suddenly, but Iran is not there yet
top.summary: The regime's opponents will hope for more pressure to accelerate the process, writes the BBC's international editor.

top.title: We choose Denmark over US, Greenland's PM says
top.summary: It is the strongest statement by a leader of the Danish territory since US President Donald Trump renewed plans to annex it.

top.title: World central bank chiefs 'stand in solidarity' with US Fed chair Powell
top.summary: Eleven central banks have backed Jerome Powell after the US launched a criminal investigation into the US Fed.

top.title: Monzo bank says issue affecting its mobile app resolved
top.summary: A Monzo spokesperson said it had activated a back-up banking service after identifying issues affecting its app.

top.title: Apple turns to Google to power AI upgrade for Siri
top.summary: Analysts say the deal is likely to be welcomed by consumers - but reflects Apple's failure to develop its own AI tools.

top.title: What a new law and an investigation could mean for Grok AI deepfakes
top.summary: Elon Musk's chatbot is under fire for altering images of women to remove their clothes without their consent.
